my.ini文件


# For advice on how to change settings please see
# http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.6/en/server-configuration-defaults.html
# *** DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE. It's a template which will be copied to the
# *** default location during install, and will be replaced if you
# *** upgrade to a newer version of MySQL.
[mysql]
#设置mysql客户端默认字符集
default-character-set=utf8
[mysqld]
#skip-grant-tables

# Remove leading # and set to the amount of RAM for the most important data
# cache in MySQL. Start at 70% of total RAM for dedicated server, else 10%.
# innodb_buffer_pool_size = 128M

# Remove leading # to turn on a very important data integrity option: logging
# changes to the binary log between backups.
# log_bin

# These are commonly set, remove the # and set as required.
basedir = F:\mysql\mysql-8.0.12-winx64
datadir = F:\mysql\mysql-8.0.12-winx64\data
port = 3306
# server_id = .....
#允许最大连接数
max_connections=200
#服务端使用的字符集为默认8比特编码的Latin1字符集
character-set-server=utf8
#创建新表时将使用默认存取引擎
default-storage-engine=INNODB
# Remove leading # to set options mainly useful for reporting servers.
# The server defaults are faster for transactions and fast SELECTs.
# Adjust sizes as needed, experiment to find the optimal values.
# join_buffer_size = 128M
# sort_buffer_size = 2M
# read_rnd_buffer_size = 2M

sql_mode=NO_ENGINE_SUBSTITUTION,STRICT_TRANS_TABLES




必须到到bin目录下




   mysqld -install


、输入net start mysql启动服务
输入mysql -u root -p进行登录数据库密码为空
12、进入之后，输入set password = password('root')修改密码，这时密码就修改成root了，你也可以修改成你自己的

update mysql.user set authentication_string=password('*******') where user='*******'



删除mysql
mysqld --remove mysql


删除注册表

a、HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\ControlSet001\Services\Eventlog\Application\MySQL 目录删除
b、HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\ControlSet002\Services\Eventlog\Application\MySQL 目录删除
c、HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\Eventlog\Application\MySQL 目录删除

修改密码
"ALTER USER 'root'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED WITH mysql_native_password BY '你的密码';"

设置远程连接权限



修改user表中的用户host  为‘%’
update user set host = '%' where user = 'root';

报错不予理会
flush privileges;






mysql> grant all privileges on *.* to root@'%' identified by '密码 ' with grant option;

mysql> flush privileges;


5.6.1

可用sc delete mysql命令
